1. Mean Density of Adults
```{r}

#read in adult data
all_org <- read_csv("adult_other.csv")

#filter for only the adult fish
adults_clean <- all_org %>%
  clean_names( case = "snake") %>%
  filter(grepl('Adult', organism)) 

#histograms
raro_2009_plot <- ggplot(adults_clean, aes(x = organism, y = rarotonga_2009, fill = organism)) +
  geom_col()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=rarotonga_2009-ci, ymax=rarotonga_2009+ci))

raro_2018_plot <- ggplot(adults_clean, aes(x = organism, y = rarotonga_2018, fill = organism))+
  geom_col()

ait_2009_plot <- ggplot(adults_clean, aes(x = organism, y = aitutaki_2009, fill = organism)) +
  geom_col()

ait_2018_plot <- ggplot(adults_clean, aes(x = organism, y = aitutaki_2018, fill = organism))+
  geom_col()


```
